statements: SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, date, usage_gallons FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT id, location, duration_minutes FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE location = 'Backyard';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE usage_gallons BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT date, location, duration_minutes, usage_gallons FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE location = 'Backyard' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, usage_gallons FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY usage_gallons DESC;
SELECT id, date, duration_minutes FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE location = 'Frontyard' AND duration_minutes BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT id, location, date, duration_minutes, usage_gallons FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE usage_gallons > 100 ORDER BY duration_minutes ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM irrigation_schedule;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule;
SELECT date, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE amount_used >= 100;
SELECT SUM(amount_used) FROM irrigation_usage WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_usage ORDER BY date DESC, amount_used ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount_used) AS average_usage FROM irrigation_usage WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE date = '2022-08-10'
SELECT schedule_id, date, amount_used FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE amount_used > 100 AND start_time < end_time
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule JOIN irrigation_usage ON irrigation_schedule.date = irrigation_usage.date WHERE irrigation_schedule.amount_used < irrigation_usage.amount_used
SELECT AVG(amount_used) AS average_amount FROM irrigation_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31'
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT date, start_time, end_time, water_usage FROM irrigation_schedules ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, end_time, area_id FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM usage_patterns WHERE patterns LIKE '%rain%';
SELECT optimization_id, area_id, optimization_strategy FROM water_optimization WHERE optimization_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE area_id = 1 AND water_usage > 100
SELECT id, date, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE water_usage < 50 AND (date = '2022-03-15' OR date = '2022-04-10')
SELECT usage_id, patterns FROM usage_patterns WHERE patterns LIKE '%rain%' AND date >= '2022-05-01'
SELECT area_id, optimization_strategy, optimization_date FROM water_optimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Smart Irrigation' ORDER BY optimization_date ASC
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC, duration DESC;
SELECT id, volume FROM water_usage WHERE volume > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, efficiency FROM optimization_data WHERE efficiency >= 0.75 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM usage_patterns WHERE pattern = 'regular';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE date = '2023-08-15';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT id, date, time, duration FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE volume BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, efficiency FROM optimization_data ORDER BY efficiency DESC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, pattern FROM usage_patterns WHERE pattern LIKE '%daily%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_data;
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM irrigation_data WHERE water_usage > 10;
SELECT zone_id, zone_name, zone_location FROM irrigation_zones ORDER BY zone_name;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT log_id, schedule_id, date, water_usage FROM irrigation_logs ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, water_usage FROM irrigation_data WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT zone_name, zone_location FROM irrigation_zones WHERE zone_location LIKE '%Garden%' ORDER BY zone_name ASC;
SELECT weather_date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time, frequency FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT log_id, date, water_usage FROM irrigation_logs WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
